update.name: Phoca Cart View Heureka.cz Shop Certification Plugin
update.description: Phoca Cart View - Heureka.cz Shop Certification Plugin - plugin that adds the Heureka.cz Shop Certification code when the order is successfully completed in Phoca Cart
